entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow or rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 07 March 2023
